typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Activité} as string,
		{Fournisseur Groupe} as string,
		{Société} as string,
		Code as string,
		Fournisseur as string,
		{Agence du client} as string,
		{Code article} as string,
		{Libellé article} as string,
		{Ref fournisseur} as string,
		{Qté Mois A-1} as string,
		{Qté Cumul A-1} as string,
		{CA Mois A-1} as string,
		{CA Cumul A-1} as string,
		{MB Mois A-1} as string,
		{MB Cumul A-1} as string,
		{VVA Mois A-1} as string,
		{VVA Cumul A-1} as string,
		{Qté Mois A} as string,
		{Qté Cumul A} as string,
		{CA Mois A} as string,
		{CA Cumul A} as string,
		{MB Mois A} as string,
		{MB Cumul A} as string,
		{VVA Mois A} as string,
		{VVA Cumul A} as string,
		yearmonth as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MabilleSaunierDuvale
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerShortName as string,
		UnitID as string,
		POSid as string,
		POSdescription as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		SupplierID as string,
		BrandID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		SectorID as string,
		Commentaire as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> OrganisationMabilleSonac
source(output(
		year as string,
		reference as string,
		{Code client} as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ventesDirectes
yearmonthNOTNULL derive(month = substring(yearmonth, 5, 2),
		year = substring(yearmonth, 1, 4),
		origin = "ecoulement") ~> ExtractYearAndMonth
ExtractYearAndMonth filter(not({Qté Mois A}=='0')) ~> FiltreQteMois
ExtractYearAndMonth filter({Qté Mois A}=='0') ~> FiltreQteMoisANull
FiltreQteMois filter({Ref fournisseur}!='') ~> FiltreRefFournisseur
FiltreRefFournisseur derive({Qté Mois A} = toDouble({Qté Mois A}),
		{Société} = iif(replace({Société}, " ", "") == replace("MABILLE - C.S.I.    ", " ", ""),"MABILLE" , {Société} )) ~> caEcoulementAndAgenceClient
caEcoulementAndAgenceClient filter({Agence du client} != '') ~> FiltreAgenceClient
OrganisationMabilleSonac filter(!isNull(POSid)) ~> FiltrePOSid
FiltrePOSid aggregate(groupBy(POSid,
		HubSAPid,
		UnitID),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID),
		WholeSalerShortName = max(WholeSalerShortName),
		POSdescription = max(POSdescription),
		County = max(County),
		POSSAMidString = max(POSSAMidString),
		SupplierID = max(SupplierID),
		BrandID = max(BrandID),
		WholeSalerHubID = max(WholeSalerHubID),
		HubName = max(HubName),
		SectorID = max(SectorID),
		Commentaire = max(Commentaire)) ~> uniqueOrganisation
FiltreAgenceClient, uniqueOrganisation join(replace({Agence du client}," ","") == replace(POSid," ","")
	&& replace({Société}," ","") == replace(UnitID," ",""),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerOrganisation
select1, uniqueOrganisation join(replace({Agence du client}," ","") == replace(POSid," ","")
	&& replace({Société}," ","") == replace(UnitID," ",""),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftOrganisation
leftOrganisation filter(isNull(POSid)) ~> leftOuterOrganisation
filter3, endVenteDirect join(MabilleSaunierDuvale@yearmonth == select2@yearmonth
	&& coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace({Ref fournisseur}, " ", ""))),replace({Ref fournisseur}, " ", "")) == coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(Article, " ", ""))),replace(Article, " ", ""))
	&& POSSAMidString == {Code client},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerVentesDirectes
innerVentesDirectes derive({Qté Mois A} = iif(toDouble({Qté Mois A})-toDouble(qte_ecoulement) >0, toDouble({Qté Mois A})-toDouble(qte_ecoulement), toDouble(0))) ~> substractVentesDirectes
innerOrganisation, endVenteDirect join(MabilleSaunierDuvale@yearmonth == select2@yearmonth
	&& coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace({Ref fournisseur}, " ", ""))),replace({Ref fournisseur}, " ", "")) == coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(Article, " ", ""))),replace(Article, " ", ""))
	&& POSSAMidString == {Code client},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftVentesDirectes
leftVentesDirectes filter(isNull(torigin)) ~> leftOuterVentesDirectes
dropColumnsInCommon2, dropColumnsInCommon union(byName: true)~> fullLeftUnion
substractVentesDirectes select(mapColumn(
		{Activité},
		{Fournisseur Groupe},
		{Société},
		Code,
		Fournisseur,
		{Agence du client},
		{Code article},
		{Libellé article},
		{Ref fournisseur},
		{Qté Mois A-1},
		{Qté Cumul A-1},
		{VVA Mois A-1},
		{VVA Cumul A-1},
		{Qté Mois A},
		{Qté Cumul A},
		{VVA Mois A},
		{VVA Cumul A},
		yearmonth = MabilleSaunierDuvale@yearmonth,
		month,
		year,
		POSid,
		HubSAPid,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerShortName,
		UnitID,
		POSdescription,
		County,
		POSSAMidString,
		SupplierID,
		BrandID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		SectorID,
		Commentaire
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumnsInCommon2
leftOuterVentesDirectes select(mapColumn(
		{Activité},
		{Fournisseur Groupe},
		{Société},
		Code,
		Fournisseur,
		{Agence du client},
		{Code article},
		{Libellé article},
		{Ref fournisseur},
		{Qté Mois A-1},
		{Qté Cumul A-1},
		{VVA Mois A-1},
		{VVA Cumul A-1},
		{Qté Mois A},
		{Qté Cumul A},
		{VVA Mois A},
		{VVA Cumul A},
		yearmonth = MabilleSaunierDuvale@yearmonth,
		month,
		year,
		POSid,
		HubSAPid,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerShortName,
		UnitID,
		POSdescription,
		County,
		POSSAMidString,
		SupplierID,
		BrandID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		SectorID,
		Commentaire
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumnsInCommon
Addcolumn select(mapColumn(
		marque_file = {Fournisseur Groupe},
		agence_code = {Agence du client},
		article = {Libellé article},
		reference = {Ref fournisseur},
		qte_ecoulement = {Qté Mois A},
		yearmonth,
		month,
		year,
		HubSAPid,
		WholeSalerShortName,
		UnitID,
		POSdescription,
		County,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque_id = BrandID,
		HubName,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniformisation
fullLeftUnion derive(distributeur = "MABILLE") ~> Addcolumn
select2 derive(torigin = "vente direct") ~> endVenteDirect
MabilleSaunierDuvale filter(!isNull(yearmonth)) ~> yearmonthNOTNULL
FiltreAgenceClient select(mapColumn(
		{Activité},
		{Fournisseur Groupe},
		{Société},
		Code,
		Fournisseur,
		{Agence du client},
		{Code article},
		{Libellé article},
		{Ref fournisseur},
		{Qté Mois A-1},
		{Qté Cumul A-1},
		{CA Mois A-1},
		{CA Cumul A-1},
		{MB Mois A-1},
		{MB Cumul A-1},
		{VVA Mois A-1},
		{VVA Cumul A-1},
		{Qté Mois A},
		{Qté Cumul A},
		{CA Mois A},
		{CA Cumul A},
		{MB Mois A},
		{MB Cumul A},
		{VVA Mois A},
		{VVA Cumul A},
		yearmonth,
		month,
		year,
		origin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select1
ventesDirectes select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth = year,
		Article = reference,
		{Code client},
		qte_ecoulement
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select2
endVenteDirect filter({Code client}=='16007943' && Article=='0010021497' &&yearmonth=='202104') ~> filter1
substractVentesDirectes filter({Code client}=='16007943' && Article=='0010021497' &&  select2@yearmonth=='202104') ~> filter2
innerOrganisation window(over(POSSAMidString,
		year,
		{Ref fournisseur}),
	qte_cumul = sum({Qté Mois A})) ~> window1
window1 filter(POSSAMidString=='16007943' && {Ref fournisseur}=="0010021497") ~> filter3
uniformisation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Représentant} as string,
		{N° Département} as string,
		{Département} as string,
		{Code point de vente} as string,
		{Libellé point de vente} as string,
		{Code Depot source} as string,
		{Code client} as string,
		Client as string,
		{N° Siret} as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		Ville as string,
		{Année livraison} as string,
		{Mois livraison} as string,
		{code fournisseur} as string,
		{fournisseur principal} as string,
		{Code produit} as string,
		produit as string,
		{Réference} as string,
		{Qte en unité de vente} as string,
		{Montant prv net} as string,
		fileName as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['MABILLE_ECOUL_PREPARED.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> MABILLEECOULPREPARED
FiltreQteMoisANull sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Région Statistique} as string,
		Enseigne as string,
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur} as string,
		{Article National DESC} as string,
		{Article National Code} as string,
		{Agence Code} as string,
		{Agence DESC} as string,
		{Département DESC} as string,
		{Département ID} as string,
		Secteur as string,
		{Quantité en UV BL} as string,
		{Année Précédente (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice A-1 (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N-1} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul N-1} as string,
		fileName as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['MABILE_QTE_NULL.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> MabileQteNull
leftOuterOrganisation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['MABILE_ORGANISATION_NOTFOUND.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> organisationNotFound
innerOrganisation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{affecte/non_affecte;plateforme/vente directe;origine de la ligne;year;month;Code client livr�;code client plateforme livree;code produit;quantite;ca;Code postal;marque;marque_code;canal_distribution_final;nom du canal;canal_final;document_vente;Agence commerciale corrig� (vente directe);Donneur d'ordre (vente directe);Facture (vente directe);Type poste Facture (vente directe);no_offre;ATC offre;ATC livr�;ATC Performance;NomATC;DR;Matricule;Motif commande;Type de facture;Description;N1groupe;N2groupe;N3groupe;N4groupe;N5groupe;N6groupe;N7groupe;N1groupedesignation;N2groupedesignation;N3groupedesignation;N4groupedesignation;N5groupedesignation;N6groupedesignation;N7groupedesignation;N1localedesignation;N2localedesignation;N3localedesignation;N4localedesignation;N5localedesignation;N6localedesignation;N7localedesignation;N1locale;N2locale;N3locale;N4locale;N5locale;N6locale;N7locale;Hi�rarchgroupe;Hi�rarchlocale;Num�ro du compte;EPS_Nom du compte;EPS_Groupe cible/Typologie g�n�rale;EPS_Sous groupe cible/Typologie d�taill�e;EPS_Compte principal: Num�ro du compte;EPS_Compte principal: Nom du compte;Client;Num�ro client indirect;CODE_CMI;NOM_CMI;Nom du compte;Client Indirect_ Groupe cible/Typologie g�n�rale;Client Indirect_ Sous groupe cible/Typologie d�taill�e;Client Indirect_  Compte principal: Num�ro du compte;Client Indirect_  Compte principal: Nom du compte;Client Direct - Hi�rarchie N1 SAP ;Client Direct - Hi�rarchie N2 SAP ;Client Indirect - Hi�rarchie N1 SAP;Client Indirect - Hi�rarchie N2 SAP;yearmonth;ATC Corrig�} as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['mabileBeforeDecremation.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> beforedecrementation
